solution_line_template: If there are {surfers_santa_monica} surfers at Santa Monica, Malibu beach has twice as many surfers as Santa Monica has {multiplier_malibu}*{surfers_santa_monica} = {surfers_malibu} surfers.
Together, the two beaches have a total of {surfers_malibu}+{surfers_santa_monica} = <<{surfers_malibu}+{surfers_santa_monica}={total_surfers}>>{total_surfers} surfers.
